name: Gravitron (Theresa Clarke)
description:
This game is a 2D puzzle platformer that follows the adventure of Dr. Gravitron as he tries to save his dog Atom from the clutches of the evil Dr. Wretched. The player must use Gravitron’s anti-gravity inventions, the anti-gravity boots and anti gravity gun, as well as their own wits to get through each room of Wretched’s lab.

Please check the How to Play before playing.

Created by Theresa Clarke, Ben Wright, and Ayumu Saito.

Box art picture created by Gabriel Purcell.

All game artwork, excluding the cage sprite, created by Ben Wright.

References for assets not created by the developers:

  • Background Music: https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/enigmatic
  • Sound effect for gun: https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/game/?page=2 “Electronic retro block hit”
  • Sound effect for gravity flipping: https://freesound.org/people/OllieOllie/sounds/255708/
  • Sound effect for door opening: https://freesound.org/people/pointparkcinema/sounds/407242/
  • Sound effect for player termination: https://freesound.org/people/notchfilter/sounds/43698/
  • Cage sprite: https://spoadr.itch.io/the-cage
